title: Did Ariana Grande win a Grammy in 2020? - Quora

response.answer_text: Unfortunately, NO. She didn't win a Grammy(s). This decision was very criticised by fans and even Billie Ellish said in her speech (obviously, when she won Grammys) that so many talented and deserving people didn't get it (only telling you the gist). And she specially mentioned Ariana's name there, she was polietly and through gestures telling her to shut up and that Billie is worthy of the Grammy(s). There is a reason speculated by fans (including me) was that (they nominated her in 6 (not sure) categories but she won no awards) in 2019, Ari was fixated on performing a song which producers (or sponsers of Grammy Awards 2019) constantly refused and wanted her to perform another one. Hence she didn't go to Grammy Awards 2019 but the Grammy she won for Best Album was mailed to her (Sweetener released on 17th August 2018). Anyway the main point is that they wanted to humiliate her. But she's a QUEEN and will continue to be one. P.S.: Lana Del Rey’s song Norman F***ing Rockwell should’ve won for Best Song (Best Song ‘Ever’ for me). Sadly, Billie won a Grammy before Lana.

No, she was snubbed again. In 2019 she was meant to do a performance but didn’t because the people who own the Grammys didn’t let her perform the songs she wanted to. (first off no hate to billie) Billie Eilish won a whole 5 Grammys for herself and they used Arianas name in their commercials to gain attention. Everytime a Grammy was announced that she was nominated for she’d look really smily and happy but as soon as she didn’t hear her name, her face completely changed, although being the humble person she is, she of course congratulated the winners without holding grudges.

Grammys Snubs: Ariana Grande and H.E.R. Shut Out Fellow five-time nominee and Grammys performer H.E.R. was also shut out Sunday night, not winning any of the five awards for which she was nominated.  Grande was nominated for two awards at the 61st Annual Grammy Awards, winning her first award for Best Pop Vocal Album for Sweetener. She was also nominated for Best Pop Solo Performance for Sweetener's second single, "God is a Woman".Billie Eilish won five awards, including record, album and song of the year, capping a night that also saw multiple wins for Lizzo and Lil Nas X.Ariana Grande has won Best Pop Vocal Album at the 61st Grammy Awards. ... Tonight marks the first time Ariana has ever won a Grammy, and as promised, she was not in attendance to accept the award. She was also nominated for Best Pop Vocal Performance (for “God is a woman”). Grande offered her thanks in a series of tweets.

Billie Eilish won five awards, including record, album and song of the year, capping a night that also saw multiple wins for Lizzo and Lil Nas X.Fellow five-time nominee and Grammy's performer H.E.R. was also shut out Sunday night, not win  ning any of the five awards for which she was nominated.
